description:
The scammer somehow gained unauthorized access to my Ethereum wallet and initiated the following transaction:https://etherscan.io/tx/0x433ff05b86d2b346f4e8d27b468f73d6c5f3dbbd7947dee47097ca51b1be2693The stolen tokens were transferred to a newly created Ethereum account:https://etherscan.io/address/0xc62635f348347464b885b79cfd10382e6c20ccd5From there, the funds were routed through relay.link to swap onto another chain:https://www.relay.link/transactions?address=7FeBL5D5BAkQaEReFuCkYpxGEuFipReUEktrzt9MM9ZmThe final destination is a Solana account holding the stolen funds in USDC:https://solscan.io/tx/4nLtfndauTDKTLwtofR5e4rWVcySLrxQMzHsbfsyBChfsp67LsgT61v1nNiNK1iUqM7pDEYEMEfgkGMA4iw1dS7GAt the time of writing, the stolen funds remain in this Solana wallet.

The scammer somehow gained unauthorized access to my Ethereum wallet and initiated the following transaction:

https://etherscan.io/tx/0x433ff05b86d2b346f4e8d27b468f73d6c5f3dbbd7947dee47097ca51b1be2693

The stolen tokens were transferred to a newly created Ethereum account:

https://etherscan.io/address/0xc62635f348347464b885b79cfd10382e6c20ccd5

From there, the funds were routed through relay.link to swap onto another chain:

https://www.relay.link/transactions?address=7FeBL5D5BAkQaEReFuCkYpxGEuFipReUEktrzt9MM9Zm

The final destination is a Solana account holding the stolen funds in USDC:

https://solscan.io/tx/4nLtfndauTDKTLwtofR5e4rWVcySLrxQMzHsbfsyBChfsp67LsgT61v1nNiNK1iUqM7pDEYEMEfgkGMA4iw1dS7G

At the time of writing, the stolen funds remain in this Solana wallet.

Amount lost

33000.00 USD
